author: jacopoc
msg: When a serialized inventory item is issued, the ownerPartyId of the inventory item is changed to the end user customer.

author: andreas
msg: Refactored AccessControl usecase: use POST forms, submit forms and use doExecute() instead of advance(), fixed handling of SSL parameter

author: bago
msg: Added support for recursive CNAME resolution in dnsjnio based resolver.
Added a LookupAsynch class into the dnsjnio project and changed the DNSJnioAsynchService to make use of that class.
